meanings.definition: A game played with wooden blocks or pieces.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the children enjoyed a fun game of loggats.
meanings.sent2: Let's gather the family and play loggats in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The loggats game got so competitive that even the adults joined in.
meanings.sent4: The sound of wooden loggats clashing together filled the park.
meanings.sent5: The colorful loggats pieces made the game exciting and vibrant.

meanings.definition: To play the game of loggats.
meanings.sent1: We loggatsed all afternoon, laughing and having a great time.
meanings.sent2: She loggatsed with her friends every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The siblings loggatsed loudly, causing a commotion in the house.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm for loggatsing was contagious to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The way she loggatsed showed her skill and strategy in the game.

meanings.definition: A wooden block or piece used in the game of loggats.
meanings.sent1: The loggats was carefully crafted from smooth wood.
meanings.sent2: He picked up the loggats and aimed it at the target.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy ran off with one of the loggats pieces.
meanings.sent4: She held the colorful loggats piece tightly in her hand.
meanings.sent5: The old loggats had been passed down through generations, holding memories of past games.
